CustomField.formula: IF( LEFT(Short_Description__c,6) = "NTD : ", RIGHT( Short_Description__c, LEN( Short_Description__c)- 5 ), IF (OR ("NTD: "= LEFT(Short_Description__c, 5 ),"NTD :" = LEFT(Short_Description__c, 5 )), RIGHT( Short_Description__c, LEN( Short_Description__c)- 5 ), IF (OR("NTD:" = LEFT(Short_Description__c,4),"NTD " = LEFT(Short_Description__c,4)), RIGHT (Short_Description__c, LEN (Short_Description__c)-4), IF (LEFT (Short_Description__c,3)= "NTD", RIGHT (Short_Description__c,LEN (Short_Description__c)-3), Short_Description__c))))
CustomField.label: NTD_Short_Description__c
